author: bago
msg: Minor changes to RemoteDelivery and Retry to make them more similar (I'd like to extract common code) (related to JAMES-874)

author: aconway
msg: Clean up end-of-dump protocol for new cluster members.

author: mharwood
msg: Fixed bug in FuzzyLikeThisQuery.java. Queries that contain a term with no fuzzy variants caused the query construction logic to exit loop early, producing no fuzzy variants for all subsequent terms in the query string.
Junit test added which recreates the problem conditions and added fix to FuzzyLikeThisQuery that solves the issue.
